item.title: Social Media Reels Creator - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented Social Media Reels Creator to transform our existing content into engaging reels for Instagram and TikTok. The ideal candidate should have a deep understanding of these platforms and a strong grasp of current trends and best practices for creating viral content. You will be responsible for selecting the most impactful moments from our content library and editing them into short, attention-grabbing reels with eye-catching transitions and effects. Attention to detail and creativity are essential, as well as the ability to work within brand guidelines. Knowledge of video editing software and experience with social media analytics is a plus.

Skills:

- Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
- Strong understanding of Instagram and TikTok platforms
- Creative thinking and ability to come up with fresh and innovative ideas
- Attention to detail and strong visual storytelling skills
- Excellent time management and organizational skills

Hourly Range: $9.00-$28.00
Posted On: June 17, 2024 02:33 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Social Media Marketing, Facebook, Social Media Management, Instagram, Social Media Content
Skills: Social Media Marketing, Facebook, Social Media Management, Instagram, Social Media Content
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Canadian UGC Creators for Food and Beverage Brands - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking various Canadian UGC creators to assist our company in producing user-generated content (UGC) for various food and beverage brands across Canada. As a UGC creator, you will play a vital role in capturing and sharing authentic content that showcases the experiences and stories behind these brands. This content will be used for marketing and promotional purposes, including social media campaigns, website content, and advertisements.

Responsibilities:
- Generate high-quality UGC content that aligns with the brand's image and messaging
- Use your creative skills to capture appealing and engaging visual and written content
- Collaborate with our team to ensure the content meets the brand's guidelines and objectives

Requirements:
- Must be a Canadian resident
- Strong photography and/or videography skills
- Excellent written communication skills
- Familiarity with social media platforms and trends
- Passionate about food and beverages

Pay is $30 USD per completed usable video

Budget: $30
Posted On: June 17, 2024 02:25 UTC
Category: Acting
Skills:Acting, Canadian English Dialect, Teen, Middle-Aged Adult, Senior Adult, Food & Beverage, UGC, Video Editing
Skills: Acting, Canadian English Dialect, Teen, Middle-Aged Adult, Senior Adult, Food & Beverage, UGC, Video Editing
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor in Book Review Niche for Faceless Youtube - Upwork
item.description:
Experienced  Faceless YouTube Video Editor For a Book Review Channel

This is a LONG-TERM position with GREAT benefits such as Bonuses and raises based on quality work and performance!

Requirements
Create engaging 8–12-minute videos 1-2 times weekly.
Must know & Understand YouTube Fair Use policies
Must be able to create engaging edits and have ability to have animated scenes
Willing to work long term and grow with the team
Must be responsible

Examples:
Below are links to my competitors' channels for you to refer to that will give you a better understanding of the level of quality we need from you.

1.https://www.youtube.com/@AfterSkool
2.https://www.youtube.com/@escaping.ordinary
3.https://www.youtube.com/@upgradedmentality

Price per Edit $40 - Bulk 5 videos = $200

Please provide samples of previous work to be considered for the position!
Look forwarding to receiving your work.

Start your message with "AveraGe" if you read this until the end.


Budget: $200

item.title: YouTube Intro Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled video editor to create a captivating 10-15 second YouTube intro for our company. The intro should effectively showcase our brand and leave a lasting impression on our viewers. As the editor, you will be responsible for editing the footage, selecting appropriate music and sound effects, and incorporating any necessary graphics or animations. The ideal candidate should have a strong sense of storytelling and visual aesthetics. Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro is required. Attention to detail and the ability to work within tight deadlines are also essential.

Skills needed:
- Video editing
- Storytelling
- Visual aesthetics
- Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro
- Attention to detail

This is a small project with a duration of under 1 month.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 17, 2024 02:09 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Intro & Outro, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Video Intro & Outro, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Gold 3D Logo Intro for Luxury Brand - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented designer to create a captivating 3D logo intro for our luxury brand. This intro will be used in our promotional videos and should exemplify the exclusivity and elegance associated with our brand. The logo intro should feature our brand logo in gold with stunning 3D effects that grab the attention of viewers.

  Skills required:
  - 3D animation
  - Logo design
  - Video editing
  - Motion graphics

  As an ideal candidate, you should have a strong portfolio showcasing your expertise in 3D animation and logo design. Attention to detail and the ability to bring ideas to life through visually striking animations are crucial.

  Length of video: 12 to 17 seconds long (optional but not required)
  Duration: Under 24 hours

Budget: $20
Posted On: June 17, 2024 02:09 UTC
Category: 3D Animation
Skills:Graphic Design, Logo Design, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator
Skills: Graphic Design, Logo Design, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator
Country: United States
